item.title: Keep your project structure simple!
item.description: What should your project structure look like? How should you structure and organize your HTTP APIs? Here’s one way by Jono Williams and my thoughts and insights about some misconceptions about Domain Driven Design. YouTube Check out my YouTube channel, where I post all kinds of content accompanying my posts, including this video showing everything in this… Read More »Keep your project structure simple! The post Keep your project structure simple!
